special_text:
Level up {RW} [i]({RW}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)[/i]
[level 1-2] Whenever a nontoken creature you control with a counter on it dies, create a 1/1 white Citizen creature token.
[level 3+] Whenever a nontoken creature you control with a counter on it dies, create a 4/4 red Error creature token with menace.
